sen.j: 平 貞文（たいら の さだふみ、貞観_(日本)14年（872年）？ － 延長 (元号)元年9月27日 (旧暦)（923年11月13日））は、平安時代中期の歌人。
sen.e: TAIRA no Sadafumi (born roughly 872, died November 13, 923 according to the modern calendar) was a mid-Heian period poet.

sen.j: 874年（貞観_(日本)16年）父とともに平姓を賜って臣籍に下り、従五位上左兵衛佐に至る。
sen.e: In 874 (Jogen 16), he and his father relinquished their imperial descent and became commoners, taking the surname "Taira" and descending to subject status; Sadafumi took a position as deputy commander of the Palace Guard of the Left, a junior fifth rank, upper grade post.
